items.name: init(points: UnsafePointer<MKMapPoint>, count: Int)
items.desc: Creates and returns a polygon object from the specified set of map points.

items.name: init(points: UnsafePointer<MKMapPoint>, count: Int, interiorPolygons: [MKPolygon]?)
items.desc: Creates and returns a polygon object from the specified set of map points and interior polygons.

items.name: init(coordinates: UnsafePointer<CLLocationCoordinate2D>, count: Int)
items.desc: Creates and returns a polygon object from the specified set of coordinates.

items.name: init(coordinates: UnsafePointer<CLLocationCoordinate2D>, count: Int, interiorPolygons: [MKPolygon]?)
items.desc: Creates and returns a polygon object from the specified set of coordinates and interior polygons.

items.name: var interiorPolygons: [MKPolygon]?
items.desc: The array of polygons nested inside the receiver.
